reviewText: Worth it just for a brief look at Otis Rush!  Also great if you want to learn how to play "Honky Tonk".  This really isn't a 5 Star DVD, its probably closer to 3 1/2 stars, but everything is relative and I value verey highly a DVD that features Otis Rush talking about the Blues and showing musicians a few things.  Its not as if there is another one out there
